flawed_nl_solution:
Malcolm has 240 followers + 500 followers = <<240+500=704>>704 followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has 704 followers / 2 = <<704/2=352>>352 followers on Twitter.
He has 352 followers x 3 = <<352*3=1056>>1056 followers on Tiktok.
He has 1056 followers + 510 followers = <<1056+510=1566>>1566 followers on Youtube.
Altogether, Malcolm has 704 followers + 352 followers + 1056 followers + 1566 followers = <<704+352+1056+1566=3678>>3678 followers on social media.
#### 3678

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 740, not 704. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
